snippet.title: Amata Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1841160/Amata
Discord: https://discord.gg/famAakEBJX

Solo dev working on a small campaign called Amata for your enjoyment. :heart:. All the content planned for the campaign is ready and in the game so I've released a demo ahead of going into EA. Thanks for watching!
